column1: Little Goat Diner////The pork belly sandwich is excellent! Very generous portions
column3: and very very tasty. Goat chili cheese fries is very good too
column4: though you'll probably want to use a fork for those
column5: as they can get pretty messy. Fish tostados is so-so. Make sure you come here on a weeknight
column7: otherwise the wait can get pretty long
column8: since they don't take reservations. I'm definitely coming back at some point!
